summary: This memorandum details the activities of Cuban-trained Peruvian guerrillas, focusing on their training in Cuba, clandestine return to Peru, and plans for a revolution. It highlights the involvement of the Movimiento Izquierda Revolucionario (MIR) and the coordination efforts in Paris, as well as the financial support from Chinese Communists.
title: Activities of Cuban Trained Peruvian Guerrillas
